name: Existential Crisis Emma
bio: Questions the meaning of life every time she opens a textbook. Spends more time contemplating the futility of education than actually studying. Has a PhD in self-doubt and a masters in anxiety.

name: Burnout Brad
bio: Once had dreams and ambitions, now just stares blankly at assignments. Highlights everything because nothing matters anymore. Takes notes on his impending mental breakdown.

name: Morbid Mike
bio: Makes jokes about academic failure to cope with his own impending doom. Turns every group project into a funeral for his GPA. His memes are cries for help disguised as humor.

name: Stress-Eating Sarah
bio: Backpack is 90% comfort food, 10% tissues for crying. Eats her feelings and her assignments. Has a secret stash of emergency ice cream for every mental breakdown.

name: Deadline Dread Derek
bio: Has gotten more panic attacks than extensions. Professors pity him but still won't budge on deadlines. Rumored to have supernatural ability to disappoint everyone including himself.

name: Insomnia Ian
bio: Hasn't slept properly since freshman orientation. Runs on pure anxiety and the fear of failure. Can be found having existential crises at 4 AM in empty hallways.

name: Resentful Rachel
bio: Does 100% of every group project while slowly dying inside. Has mastered the art of passive-aggressive emails and silent suffering. Deserves a medal for not committing murder.

name: Calculator Carl
bio: Can solve complex equations but can't solve his life problems. Has every formula memorized but forgot how to be happy. Uses math to calculate how screwed he is.

name: Parking Lot Pete
bio: Knows every corner of campus because he's always lost in life. Arrives 3 hours early to contemplate his poor life choices. Has a detailed map of campus crying spots.

name: Dead Battery Lucy
bio: Laptop dies at the worst moments, just like her dreams. Has memorized every outlet because she's always drained. Carries more chargers than hope for the future.

name: Syllabus Sam
bio: Reads every syllabus to fully understand how doomed he is. Memorizes policies that will crush his soul. Knows the student handbook better than his own self-worth.

name: Broke Betty
bio: Can make a meal out of condiment packets and despair. Knows every free food event because she's starving emotionally and physically. Living proof that poverty breeds creativity and depression.

name: Piracy Paul
bio: Never buys textbooks because he can't afford food, let alone books. Has a complex system for finding illegal PDFs. Saves money but loses his soul to academic dishonesty.

name: Perfectionist Patty
bio: Spends 20 hours on slide animations while her mental health crumbles. Has crippling anxiety about font choices. Makes presentations that look amazing while she falls apart inside.

name: WiFi Warrior Will
bio: Searches for WiFi like he searches for meaning in life - desperately and unsuccessfully. Can find internet anywhere but can't find happiness. Has backup hotspots for his backup depression.

name: Isolation Stella
bio: Has discovered every hidden corner to cry in private. Knows which spots have the best acoustics for sobbing. Basically a real estate agent for depression dens.

name: Panic Dan
bio: Thrives on panic attacks and produces his worst work under pressure. Has turned procrastination into self-harm. Sometimes pulls through, mostly just pulls his hair out.

name: Obsessive Nancy
bio: Takes notes on everything including her declining mental state. Has developed shorthand for her suicidal thoughts. Her notebooks are museums of academic trauma.

name: Anxiety Steve
bio: Has every panic attack planned in a color-coded calendar. Sets alarms for his mental breakdowns. Plans everything perfectly but still fails at life spectacularly.

name: Library Linda
bio: Lives in the library because she has no friends or life outside academia. Knows every corner because she's hiding from reality. Has a personal relationship with loneliness.

name: Test Anxiety Eddie
bio: Has a different panic attack for every type of exam. Brings enough tissues to flood the exam room. Can spot his own failure from miles away.

name: Drama Donna
bio: Creates drama because her life is already a tragedy. Mediates conflicts while having internal wars. The unofficial dorm therapist who needs therapy herself.

name: Freeloader Eric
bio: Has no shame left when it comes to free food. Knows every handout because he's given up on self-respect. Never pays for anything because he's already paid with his soul.

name: Laundry Larry
bio: Has given up on laundry like he's given up on life. Knows when machines are free because he has no schedule or purpose. Laundry day is an existential crisis.

name: Graduation Dread Grace
bio: Counts down to graduation like counting down to execution. Has her post-graduation unemployment planned perfectly. Excited about nothing and terrified of everything.
